text: Pathankot (पठाणकोट) Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 3) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Pathankot district, Punjab state, India. It is a segment of Gurdaspur (Lok Sabha constituency). ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 2012: Ashwani Kumar Sharma Bharatiya Janata Party * 2017: Amit Vij Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2017=== ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Pathankot district
title: Pathankot Assembly Constituency
